note.p: Naval surgeon. Served as surgeon with HMS Plumper on the west coast of Africa, 1853–6. Later in Bangkok, Siam (Thailand). In England from at least 1874. FRGS, 1857.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1735/79/14), 1891 (RG12/590/158/56)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 July 2017)
Journal of the Royal Geographical Society 32 (1862): xxiv
Scotland, select births and baptisms, 1564–1950 (Ancestry.com, accessed 26 July 2017)
Scotland statutory marriages 644/6 313 Blythswood, Glasgow (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 26 July 2017)
